Alternatively, "The Yearling" is also an engaging watch. It tells the story of a young boy who adopts a wild deer only to face the consequences when it misbehaves. A heartwarming drama with a strong bond between humans and nature, featuring Forrest Tucker, Jane Wyman, and June Lockhart. Enjoy!
